name: typer
title: Typer - Custom Text Hotkey
description: An extension for the lazy typer. Add any text you type on a regular basis into commands. Give each command an alias and a hotkey, and save time on typing.
author: yaronschwimmer

preferences.name: typercommand1
preferences.title: Text 1
preferences.description: Text that will be typed into your screen
